document.full_text: the world health organization slashed its budget by nearly $1 billion thursday and cut 300 jobs at the u.n. agency's headquarters, because of financial constraints in donor countries, who officials said.
document.title: who slashes budget, jobs in new era of austerity
lines_and_colors: the world health organization slashed its budget by nearly $1 billion thursday and cut 300 jobs at the u.n. agency's headquarters, because of financial constraints in donor countries, who officials said.
